SELECT tb.*, COUNT(DISTINCT tbl.id) AS likeNum, COUNT(DISTINCT tbc.id) AS collectNum, COUNT(DISTINCT tc.id) AS messageNum FROM tb_blog tb LEFT JOIN tb_blog_like tbl ON tb.id = tbl.blogId LEFT JOIN tb_blog_collect tbc ON tb.id = tbc.blogId LEFT JOIN tb_comment tc ON tb.id = tc.articleId
and tb.isDeleted = 0
and title like concat('%',concat(#{request.title},'%'))
and tag like concat('%',concat(#{request.tag},'%'))
and createTime between #{request.beginDate} and #{request.endDate}
GROUP BY tb.id ORDER BY tb.createTime desc

SELECT count( 1 ) as likeCount, blogId as blogId, b.title as title FROM `tb_blog_like` AS l LEFT JOIN tb_blog b ON l.blogId = b.id WHERE b.isDeleted = 0 GROUP BY l.blogId ORDER BY likeCount desc LIMIT 10

SELECT count( 1 ) as writeCount, u.id as userId, u.username as username FROM `tb_blog` AS b LEFT JOIN tb_user as u ON b.authorId = u.id where u.state=0 GROUP BY b.authorId ORDER BY writeCount desc LIMIT 10
